text: Megalobrimus granulipennis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1954. It is known from Tanzania.BioLib.cz - Megalobrimus granulipennis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Phrissomini Category:Beetles described in 1954
title: Megalobrimus granulipennis
